card_text: Target 1 face-up monster you control and 1 Xyz Monster in your GY; equip that monster from your GY to that monster on the field as an Equip Spell with these effects.$N●Change the equipped monster's ATK to this card's ATK.$N●The equipped monster gains this card's Attribute.$N●At the end of the Damage Step, if the equipped monster attacked: You can send this card to the GY; that attacking monster can make a second attack in a row.
